Summary: Star like object had a steady flight heading east then it pulsed like, went thought the cloud and turned to leave with exceeding speed.
divs: sighting detailsmy husband and i just finished working on our land and was sitting on our houseboat in front yard resting . i noticed a star like object colored orangish\ gold just above tree tops heading east then it kind of bounced or pulshed back and forth slightly, went trough a cloud , then it looked like it changed direction slightly and with exceeding speed left. my husband came inside and stared research online. i stayed out until 1am with our telescope hoping to see it again while waiting to see the asteroid . i believe that object is nothing from our world , i think it may be from the heavenly realms.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Aiken
There were no other sightings in Aiken on or around August 24th 2013
